data.description:
Project Details
The solution for token communities to build relationships, work together and vote. Manage members, coordinate tasks, facilitate structured discussions & decisions, and hold each other accountable.

What are you going to build?:
With thousands of users already using CharmVerse, we want to extend our support to the Optimism ecosystem. Here are a couple of use cases directly applicable to Optimism:

Grant submission, voting and post-grant tracking
a) Reddit-like forum for structured conversations

b) Grant proposal template

c) Commenting/Suggesting changes to proposal

d) Dedicated review role and workflow to ensure grant submission fit desired format with all necessary information

e) Track critical milestones and release funds per milestone completion via Gnosis Safe

Hackathon Ops
Running a hackathon with CharmVerse https://www.charmverse.io/post/building-engaging-well-run-web3-hackathons-with-charmverse 9

Example page from GoodHackNYC CharmVerse - the all-in-one web3 space 5

a) Hosting essential event information on public pages

b) Grant roles to participants and ecosystem partners based on token/NFT holding of the user’s connected wallet

c) Facilitate team formation by surfacing hacker profiles and project ideas

d) Facilitate teamwork and collaboration by giving each team their own project space

e) Provide a transparent voting mechanism and results

f) A place to showcase final projects

Access control
We manage permissions to access capabilities and content via role-based access control. Roles are assigned automatically based on the crypto assets in a user’s wallet. We will ensure that tokens/NFTs on Optimism will be supported.
data.title: CharmVerse
Optimism - Cycle 11 grant
data.description:
How do you justify the size of the grant?
CharmVerse is a complex project with many code paths that support various use cases. To properly integrate Optimism, we need to apply significant design, engineering, and QA resources.

Roadmap

Describe in discrete steps your plan for accomplishing your project:
For each feature, we will

Create low fidelity mockup/prototype
Conduct user interviews/research
Create high fidelity design
Code
Deploy feature in our staging environment with testnet
QA
Deploy feature in our staging environment with mainnet
QA

data.name: Optimism
data.description: OP Mainnet is a Layer 2 Optimistic Rollup network designed to utilize the strong security guarantees of Ethereum while reducing its cost and latency.

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the advancement of the Web3 grants ecosystem?
questions.explanation: Contributions to Web3 grants on-chain registry, Development of Web3 Grants tooling, Aggregation of Web3 grants news and events

questions.query: Describe your previous work or plans related to the Web3 grants ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
CharmVerse has been actively involved in the web3 grants ecosystem through various initiatives and plans to streamline and enhance the grant application and management processes. Here's an overview of our previous work and ongoing plans:

**Grants Management Platform**
CharmVerse has been instrumental in managing and supporting several prominent grant programs in the Web3 space. Our collaboration with key projects, such as the Optimism Grants, Polygon, Arbritrum, Mantle, Taiko, and Cyber, highlights our commitment to fostering innovation and growth within the community. The CharmVerse platform facilitates the efficient management of grants, ensuring that organizations can focus on their core objectives while we handle the administrative and logistical aspects. By providing an organized and efficient system for tracking and managing these grants, we help ensure that funds are allocated transparently and that projects with the potential to drive significant impact are given the support they need. 

**Fully Managed Grants Programs**
In addition to the platform, CharmVerse program management services to select grants programs. Our managed grant programs include Polygon Community Grants, Arbitrum in Refi Grants Program, and Cyber Ecosystem Grants.  Our approach to managing grant programs is entirely hands-on, encompassing all aspects from recruiting subject matter experts to support builders to marketing and promoting the program and scoring the applications. We believe our expertise in web3 grants allows us to advance the grants space by ensuring that the most promising projects receive the support and resources they need to succeed.

**Grants Tracker Launch**
CharmVerse launched a comprehensive grants tracker to inform users about various grant opportunities in the web3 space. The tracker includes a main calendar for upcoming deadlines, an Open for Applications page, program-specific folders, and a grantee toolkit.


**Resources for Grant Applicants**
CharmVerse has curated a resources center with best practices and guidance for grant applicants, helping them navigate the application process more effectively. These are available on our Grants Tracker and our website and are being promoted across social media on a constant basis.

**Charm Connect**
CharmVerse is designing and building Charm Connect, a platform for connecting builders with grant programs and other onchain opportunities. We believe that onchain builders deserve better support for their journey from onboarding to finding resources to scale their impact.

questions.query: How does your project create value for the Web3 grants ecosystem?
questions.explanation:
CharmVerse creates significant value for the Web3 grants ecosystem through a multifaceted approach that enhances efficiency, accessibility, and support for grant-giving organizations and applicants. 

Our platform fosters transparent communication between grantors and grantees, improving the overall grant process. Features like the rubric format standardize evaluation criteria, facilitating fair and consistent application assessments. This benefits grant-giving organizations by streamlining their decision-making and providing applicants with constructive feedback, creating a positive and productive experience. CharmVerse has received positive feedback from users, like those from the Optimism Grants Council and RareDAO, highlighting the improved committee discussions and overall process due to the features implemented in CharmVerse. With the help of CharmVerse, the Optimism Grants Council has more than 3X its applications while providing a better experience for applicants.

CharmVerse also drives value through innovative marketing strategies and community engagement efforts. We support the Web3 grants ecosystem by offering extensive educational resources and best practices tailored for grant applicants. These resources include templates, guides, and tips on crafting compelling proposals and understanding grant requirements, which empower applicants to improve the quality of their submissions and increase their chances of securing funding. Furthermore, our grants tracker consolidates information from multiple programs, offering users a single location to find application deadlines, program requirements, and submission guidelines. This reduces administrative overhead for grant-giving organizations and makes it easier for applicants to stay informed about relevant opportunities.

Ultimately, CharmVerse advances the Web3 grants ecosystem by ensuring that the most promising projects receive the support and resources they need to succeed. Our comprehensive approach, combining efficient grant management, educational support, and community engagement, creates a robust environment that nurtures innovation and growth within the Web3 space.

questions.query: Describe your team's expertise in your chosen focus area within Web3 grants. Include relevant experience, publications, or past projects.
questions.explanation:
The CharmVerse team boasts a wealth of expertise in the Web3 grants space, backed by extensive experience, notable past projects, and strong industry connections. Our team’s deep knowledge and hands-on experience uniquely position us to effectively support and manage grant programs.

**Expertise in Supporting and Managing Grant Programs**
Our team has a proven track record in successfully managing several prominent grant programs, including the Polygon Community Grants, Arbitrum in Refi Grants Program, and Cyber Ecosystem Grants. CharmVerse has a dedicated customer success team committed to providing personalized support to grant applicants and grantees. This team helps applicants navigate the complexities of the application process, offering guidance and resources that enhance the quality of submissions. For grantees, we provide ongoing support to ensure they can meet their project milestones and utilize their funding effectively.

**Connections with Prominent Personalities**
Our strong connections with key figures in the Web3 grants space enable us to assemble top-tier evaluation committees and provide grant programs with access to leading subject matter experts. These connections ensure that our grant programs are evaluated by individuals with deep industry knowledge and insight, which enhances the credibility and impact of the funding decisions. 

**Publications and Contributions**
Our team members are experienced practitioners and active contributors to the Web3 and blockchain communities. They have authored articles, been interviewed in podcasts, participated in industry conferences, and engaged in thought leadership activities that help shape the future of the Web3 grants ecosystem.

**Team Background and Experience**

Alex Poon (Co-founder, CEO):
Background: Co-founder and CEO with a history of founding successful companies like x.ai (raised $45M, exit) and Visual Revenue (exit).

Matt Casey (Co-founder, CTO):

Background: CTO with a robust technical background, having co-founded x.ai with Alex and architected its initial product.

Chris Carella (Head of Product):

Background: Former founding SVP of Product for startup studios and head of product for several innovation and data science labs.


The CharmVerse team’s deep expertise, dedicated support structures, and strong industry connections uniquely position us to effectively manage and support grant programs. Our holistic approach ensures that grant-giving organizations and applicants benefit from a well-structured, transparent, and impactful grant ecosystem.

questions.query: How do you plan to share insights, methodologies, or tools developed through your project with the Cartographer Syndicate and the broader Web3 grants community?
questions.explanation:
At CharmVerse, we believe in the power of collaboration and knowledge-sharing to advance the Web3 grants ecosystem. We are committed to sharing the insights, methodologies, and tools developed through our project with the Cartographer Syndicate and the broader Web3 grants community in several impactful ways. 

We plan to keep producing content that outlines our findings, best practices, and innovative approaches to managing and applying to grant programs. These documents will be available to the Cartographer Syndicate and the broader community through our website, newsletters, and industry forums. By providing comprehensive analyses and case studies, we aim to equip applicants and organizations with the knowledge to enhance their grant processes. Furthermore, CharmVerse adopts a fully open-source philosophy, allowing the broader web3 grants ecosystem to benefit from efficient and transparent grant management practices. Finally, we are committed to maintaining an open line of communication with the Web3 grants community. Through regular surveys, feedback sessions, and community forums, we will gather insights from other stakeholders and incorporate their suggestions into our methodologies and tools. This collaborative approach ensures our contributions are relevant and valuable to the broader community.

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation: CharmVerse provides a place for onchain communities to connect and collaborate. It is a platform for members to build relationships, work together and vote. Manage members, coordinate tasks, facilitate structured discussions & decisions, and hold each other accountable. Decentralized communities big and small use CharmVerse as their source of truth for key information, town square for structured discussion, and a place to make decisions. It is also a popular platform for onchain grants programs such as Optimism, Polygon, and Mantle.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
- Grants Management. Highly configurable review and voting steps adapt to grants councils' specific processes. Streamlined application and communication features keep grantees informed, reducing their anxiety.

- Governance. Collaborative workflow for managing DAO proposals, grants applications, and hackathon project submissions

- Task Management + Rewards. Project management boards and tables with built-in crypto rewards.

- Membership. Sign in with wallet, Google, email, and Discord. Auto-built profile with ENS, Lens, Telegram, NFTs/POAPs & other identities

- Forum: Structured discussions for topics across categories. Post, comment, and upvote/downvote

- Decentralized Access Control. Join the CharmVerse space via private links or token-gate(s)

CharmVerse delivers these capabilities via modern UX. It is the only platform that support the many use cases needed by decentralized communities.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation: We love building with our community and we continued to receive feature requests from them. Improved table/database capabilities, native AI features, and new onchain integrations are some of the most popular requests.

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation: Trusted by EF, Optimism, Polygon, and Mantle, CharmVerse is a grants management and community platform designed for onchain communities. Designed for onchain/offchain collaboration, CharmVerse provides highly configurable review and voting steps adapted to voters and grants councils' specific processes. Streamlined application and communication features keep the community informed. The platform includes token-based role assignments, decentralized credentials, and milestone-based tracking and payments.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
CharmVerse stands out in terms of its superior user experience and flexibility. It is unique in its ability to configure the platform to address the exact needs of the grants council and other onchain communities.

- Submission form: step-by-step guide for applicants with fully customizable templates

- Adapt to your workflow: configure evaluation steps that map to your process. (e.g., Initial Review, Shortlist, Final Review, Milestone Tracking)

- Integrated communication: one place for community members and council members to view, comment, and suggest changes to grant applications
- Customizable transparency: different roles get different access: publicly viewable, comment only, review/evaluation, & vote

- Know the applicants: member profiles that auto-populate with applicants’ ENS, Lens, and other identities. Generate decentralized credentials for successful grant applications and milestone completions.

- Milestone tracking & payments

- Notifications: Applicants receive in-app and email notifications for key status changes and feedback from the grants council.

- Essential grants integrations, including Docusign, Synaps, Persona, Snapshot, Safe, Ethereum Attestation Service and more

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation: We build with our community. We continue to add features that benefit our community's immediate needs. In the near term, our focus will be on additional integration that makes working with CharmVerse and other platforms easier.
